weka.core
Interface Randomizable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdaBoostM1, Bagging, BFTree, ClassBalancedND, CostSensitiveClassifier, CVParameterSelection, Dagging, DataNearBalancedND, Decorate, END, Grading, GridSearch, LogitBoost, MetaCost, MiddleOutConstructor, MultiBoostAB, MultiClassClassifier, MultilayerPerceptron, MultiScheme, ND, RacedIncrementalLogitBoost, RandomCommittee, RandomForest, RandomizableClassifier, RandomizableIteratedSingleClassifierEnhancer, RandomizableMultipleClassifiersCombiner, RandomizableSingleClassifierEnhancer, RandomSubSpace, RandomTree, RotationForest, SimpleCart, Stacking, StackingC, ThresholdSelector, Vote
public interface Randomizable

Interface to something that has random behaviour that is able to be seeded with an integer.

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $
Author:
Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
